author: Nick Nairn
method: Cook the rice according to the packet instructions and then stir in the coriander, lime zest and juice, salt and freshly ground black pepper and olive oil.  Spoon into a bowl and serve.
ingredients: 200g/7oz basmati rice,  3 tbsp fresh chopped coriander,  1 lime, zest and juice,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  dash of olive oil
